プレーヤーは寒い砂漠にいます。人は毛布を売っています。寒すぎから毛布を買いました。

You go for a hike and finds some huts in the mountain. You scavenge them for a small amount of gold.
You get lost and by some unfortunate bad luck end up at the Werewall. A werewolf spots you and takes chase. You try to throw whatever is in your pocket at it.
You fall into the pit. Luckily there is a ladder to get out. Unluckily you have to pay to use it.
You go to the abandoned goldmine in hopes of making a quick buck, for some reason it works.
